description: There is nothing quite like a cold, sweet ice cream on a sultry summer day. Cheesecakes, Ice Creams & Pies is the perfect app for the season, filled with hundreds of delicious, cool, sweet treats for the festive months of summer. Planning a party at your pool or gathering for a picnic in the park? These tried-and-true recipes deliver the perfect finish to a memorable day with friends and family. Whether your guests love fruity, creamy, chocolatey, minty, or citrusy, you will find the perfect recipe here. Search by keyword or browse by category. Save your favorites.
